英雄的な行動をしました
examples.romaji: Eiyuu teki na koudou o shimashita
examples.romaji_meaning: Eiyuu teki (Heroic) na koudou (action) o shimashita (did)

examples.sentence: 誠実さを大切にします
examples.romaji: Seijitsu sa o taisetsu ni shimasu
examples.romaji_meaning: Seijitsu sa (Honesty) o taisetsu (important) ni shimasu (make)

examples.sentence: 良心の呵責に苦しみます
examples.english: I suffer from pangs of conscience.

examples.romaji_meaning: Warikan (Split the bill) ni shimashou (let's do)

examples.english: I pay by splitting the bill.

examples.sentence: 明白な理由があります
examples.romaji_meaning: Meihaku (Clear) na riyuu (reason) ga arimasu (there is)

examples.sentence: 罰としてこれをします
examples.romaji: Batsu to shite kore o shimasu
examples.romaji_meaning: Batsu (Punishment) to shite (as) kore (this) o shimasu (do)
examples.english: I do this as a punishment.

examples.romaji_meaning: Shinchiku (New construction) no ie (house) o tatemasu (build)
examples.english: I build a newly constructed house.
